attributes.action: Bring back National Service to teach respect and the value of hard work for those that offend
attributes.additional_details:
Bring back National Service to teach respect and the value of hard work for those that offend.

With prisons overflowing and armed forces being reduced we should be looking to take offenders and reform them by installing Respect , the Value of hard work and Pride in Great Britain.

Offenders should be offered National Service for certain crimes and successful service ought to release them from or reduce any custodial sentence.
